A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This move was Amazing. Sure\, they introduce some new concepts that may turn off older fans\, but they did an amazing job of telling a story we had never seen before in a Star Wars movie. The dynamic between Rey and Kylo is great. Finn and Rose\, not so much. And yes\, Luke and Rey could have had more screen time when they were on the island\, but this is definitely one of the best performances we have seen from Mark Hamill as Luke. Yes he was a bit under used\, but he made the movie great. As a fan\, I too was taken aback by some of the new things introduced in the movie. But the more I think about it\, they were for the better. The best part about this is that now we will not know what episode 9 is going to be like. They have so much potential with what they can do there.
